item.title: the first
item.description: Regis Philibert â€¢ Hugo Page Resources and how to use them front matter only contains manually added title, so no date or anything else yet some random images have now been placed in the first folder, and displayed using new Resources template code in single.html that should work for all pages also added testbundle to the menu, and it can be changed later Is there a hugo new command to generate new content in Page Resource format, including Archetype, or does everything have to be added manually?
